mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_birthday) values(#{m.me_id},#{m.me_pw},#{m.me_email},#{m.me_birthday})
insert into member_ok(mo_me_id, mo_num, mo_valid_time) values(#{mok.mo_me_id},#{mok.mo_num}, date_add(#{mok.mo_valid_time},interval 1 hour))
mapper.delete: delete from member_ok where mo_me_id = #{mok.mo_me_id} and mo_num = #{mok.mo_num}
